Dialogue.text: Woah... Look at this place! It sure looks busy in here!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Hello?
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Is anyone in?
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: WAIT A MINUTE!
Howdy! Welcome to Manta's Junkshop.
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: This is where I make something out of the odds and ends that I collect from the pollution.
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: One man's trash is another man's treasure. I make the trash into anything you want.
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: SO! how can I help you?
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text:
We heard about you from Miss Puffin.
We need your help to fix our submarine.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: AH! Yes yes! The lovely Miss Puffin. Always full of energy that one.
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: What needs to be fixed?
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text:
Our submarine's propeller..
 Err... it just can't move...
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Let's see... Oh man, I don't have any parts that can help you. But...
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: Look at all this Junk! I'm sure we can make something out of it!
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: *stomach growl*
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: Can you please tend to my customers until I get back?
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: But we need the propeller to continue our search!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Yes, We'll help!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: I've got to *stomach growls* go
Dialogue.Speaker: Manta

Dialogue.text: Oh no! Looks like Mr. Manta didn't give us the passcode to his toolbox
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: We'll have to figure this out ourselves!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Thank you! Now let’s get to work!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally
